item.title: The Eye Ring scanner transforms printed text into audio and Braille
item.description: Source: Red Dot Design website Struggling to read? There’s a ring that could help. The Eye Ring, honored with a Best of the Best Red Dot Design Award in 2013, is a page scanner designed to be worn as a ring when not actively being used. To use, the top of the ring is placed face-down on the text, initiating optical character recognition to transform the text into audio or Braille.
